properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_UD ( PRODUCT_NO , CATEGORY , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_OP , PRICE , EXPLAIN , DETAIL , AMOUNT , MANAGER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , REF_BOARD_NO , REF_NO , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 4 , SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , CATEGORY , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , AMOUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT_UD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , CATEGORY , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_OP , PRICE , EXPLAIN , DETAIL , AMOUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT_UD WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BOARD_NO = 4 AND REF_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_PRODUCT_UD SET CATEGORY = ? , PRODUCT_NAME = ? , PRODUCT_OP = ? , PRICE = ? , EXPLAIN = ? , DETAIL = ? , AMOUNT = ? WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE ATTACHMENT_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , REF_BOARD_NO , REF_NO , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 4 , ? , ? )
UPDATE TB_PRODUCT_UD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
